app.name: Cheerleader App
app.description: The ultimate positive reinforcement App for delivering awesome Customer Service!

terms: %@ you're the man (or woman) !,Own it %@ !,%@ you are the ticketmaster !,This ticket has nothing on you %@ !,Who needs macros?  You got this %@ !,Make the customer love you %@ !,Are you feeling the Zen yet %@ ?,%@ you have the touch.... you have the power,%@ if you can't even help them then nothing can,%@ keep up the good work buddy !,%@ I'm just impressed by your skills level,%@ I honestly don't know how we would do without you,%@ I WANT YOU,%@ come on ! you can do it !,%@ you seriously deserve a medal,Your country would be proud %@,Viva %@ !,You are doing so well %@ keep going !,I've never doubted you %@,Victoria Beckham would call you Supporty Spice!,S-U-P-P-O-R-T SUPPORT!,Dig deep!,Support FTW !,You should be crowned King of Support,Oh boy that's an easy one for you !,The force is strong in you
